contextName.description: The name of the context to which the state aggregate belongs

aggregateName.description: The name of the aggregate to which the state aggregate belongs

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the aggregate

ownerId.description: The owner ID of the aggregate resource

eventId.description: The ID of the domain event stream.

firstOperator.description: The first person who operates the aggregate is the creator

operator.description: The last person who operates the aggregate

firstEventTime.description: The first event time of the aggregate, which is the time it was created

state.description: The state data of the aggregate

deleted.description: Whether the aggregate has been deleted
